sentences.english: The ship threaded her way between the hidden rocks.
A large rust-colored gorgonian sea fan perches against a reef in Micronesia.
sentences.chinese: 一個大的鏽色的可怕的海扇依靠密克羅尼西亞的暗礁。

sentences.english: Our ship was thrown on a reef.
sentences.chinese: 我們的船撞到了暗礁上。

sentences.english: Service policy meta-data is another under-water stone.
sentences.chinese: 服務政策元數據是另一個暗礁。

sentences.english: Hidden boulders have been removed by dynamiting.
Linjiang over the fast river currents, waterfalls and rocks are everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 臨江以上的河段水流湍急，到處是瀑布和暗礁。

sentences.english: And a new submerged reef, named "Dingyan", was discovered at northeast part of Suyan Reef.
sentences.chinese: 並在蘇巖東北方向新發現了一個“丁巖”暗礁。

sentences.english: The heat skeet, blow a reef through ya car, my God.
sentences.chinese: 開火，把你的車打成一塊暗礁，我的天。

sentences.english: Steady sunward, though the weather hide the wide and treacherous shoal.
sentences.chinese: 堅定不移向着太陽，度過淺灘暗礁。

sentences.english: Orange cup coral clusters on a pier piling on Bonaire Island in the West Indies.
sentences.chinese: 橙色杯狀珊瑚暗礁屬在西印度羣島的博內爾島。

sentences.english: The ship hit some rocks and sank.
sentences.chinese: 那船觸到了一些暗礁沉沒了。

sentences.english: The ship failed to clear the reef.
Settling down beside the reef, I saw dead coral everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 在水下暗礁的旁邊，我看到到處都是死去的珊瑚。

sentences.english: The pilot guided us through the dangerous reefs.
sentences.chinese: 這位引航員引導我們通過了危險的暗礁區。

sentences.english: Our ship stranded near the submerged reefs.
sentences.chinese: 我們的客輪在暗礁附近擱淺了。

definition: (of a ship) to strike a reef/(fig.) to hit a snag
